title: Polki and Pink Stone Petal Jhumka - "Roopam" Collection
materials: Encrusted with CZ stones. Featuring a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: These Jhumka style earrings feature a unique floral design with pink tourmaline petals and a polki diamond in the center. The gold setting is intricately detailed with CZ accents, adding a modern twist to a traditional silhouette. This combines modern artistry with the elegance of traditional techniques.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
and everyday wear. Suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of modern design and traditional South Indian aesthetics. The uncut polki diamond and pink tourmaline create a striking contrast, while the CZ accents add a touch of sparkle. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty.
